definitions.definition: Denotes a mingling or intermixing with distinct or separable objects. (See Usage Note at amidst.)
definitions.example: How can you speak with authority about their customs when you have never lived among them?

definitions.definition: Denotes a belonging of a person or a thing to a group.
definitions.example: He is among the few who completely understand the subject.

definitions.definition: Denotes a sharing of a common feature in a group.
definitions.example: Lactose intolerance is common among people of Asian heritage.
